channel.title: Save Titan fund!
channel.description:
Hey MITBers, I never thought I'd need to do this. Desperate times calls for desperate measures they say!
I'm sure most of you (well anybody whos anybody that is) knows of my epic adventure to create a CPU. Im sure most of you previously knew it as the small relay cpu, times have changed people! TTL is the way forward!
Basically what I'm trying to get at is that I know some of you are reasonably loaded and can spare a few quid? Right?
http://titan.chipin.com/titan-ttl-cpu-httpmarccleavemeukcpuindexhtm
So like, if you wouldn't mind do you think any of you could donate some free $$$ plox? Just so you dont think I'm trying to SCAM any of you I'll put up the parts list in a few minutes, I'm just getting this out there right now. :)
Cheers guys! ;)
(Oh and here is the project page for those wishing to read the updates that have happened in the past like two years: http://marc.cleave.me.uk/cpu/index.htm)

item.title: Save Titan fund!
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:12, topic:431237”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=533914.msg3910324#msg3910324 date=1328657642]

he has $350 of the $300 he needs

Aha, I missed that. I’m surprised people here, on average, donated $38.88. Nice going mopar.
[/quote]Based on the comments I don’t even think it was just moparians that donated[/quote]

It was 9 contributors when I donated, must have been one of the 9 that put him over the top.

Read full topic

item.title: Save Titan fund!
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

That’s so awesome, where do you even learn to do these things at this age?

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:7, topic:431237”][quote author=Tree link=topic=533914.msg3903648#msg3903648 date=1328013603]
I’d invest if there was a return.
[/quote]
You get your name engraved in an aluminium plate on the back of Titan! Your name could be associated with a great and awesome device such as Titan, forever… :)[/quote]

Make sure my name is well engraved

Read full topic
